AllTours.Remarks:
Humayuns Tomb, Iskcon Temple and Chattarpur Temple will be covered on Mondays. Rashtrapati Bhavan, Parliament House and Feroz Shah Kotla are shown from outside.
Red fort, Lotus Temple, Indira Gandhi Memorial and Nehru Museum will be closed on Sunday

AllTours.Remarks: updated on 01.06.09.This is a A.C Bus on twin sharing acco.
AllTours.Notes:
Departure: Every Sunday / Monday / Wednesday / Friday 21:30 Hrs.
Return: Next Sunday/Monday/Wednesday / Friday 04:00 Hrs.

AllTours.Remarks: This package can also be arranged by Car Innova Tempo Traveller on extra payment.
AllTours.Notes: Sun, Tue & Wed tour will be operated only in the month of May & June & Friday tour will be operated from May to October

AllTours.FullTourName: Delhi –Naimisaranaya – Ayodhya- Janakpur- Sitamarhi – Bodhgaya – Gaya – Varanasi – Sarnath – Sitapur – Allahabad- Agra – Mathura
AllTours.Notes: We can arrange your Train / Flight Tickets upto Varanasi on extra payment. Note : In the month of May , tour will be operated every Monday.

AllTours.Remarks: Accommodation charges at rest of the places are to be borne by the pilgrims. This tour can be arranged by flight from Delhi-Srinagar-Delhi.From Srinagar to Baltal , Gulmarg , Pahalgam and Srinagar local sight seeing can be arranged by car.Baltal to Amarnath by pony Helicopter. Please contact our office for charges.
AllTours.Notes: Accommodation charges at rest of the places are to be borne by the pilgrims. This tour can be arranged by flight from Delhi-Srinagar-Delhi.From Srinagar to Baltal , Gulmarg , Pahalgam and Srinagar local sight seeing can be arranged by car.Baltal to Amarnath by pony / Helicopter. Please contact our office for charges.

AllTours.Remarks: UPDATED ON 260306, THE FARE IS APPLICABLE EX-KATHMANDU .AIR FARE IS EXTRA.
AllTours.Notes:
Please carry your identification like Ration Card/Identity Card/Driving License/Passport or a Photo attestation from a Notary Public.
Fare: Delhi - Kathmandu - Delhi flights charges (including airport tax) will be extra.

Flight fare to & fro Kathmandu is extra Tours are operated once minimum group size of 12 pax is attained Please ask for brochure for details / rules & regulations you are reaching Kailash Manasarovar on full moon days. For a group booking of minimum 15 paying pax, we will offer one pax complimentary as tour leader.
No Service on Fridays as 'Taj Mahal' is closed
Monday & Friday tour will be operated throughout the year. Wednesday tour will be operated in the months of April, May, June, September & October only.
Tuesday tour will be operated only in the month of April,May,June & October Only Friday tour will be operated throughout the year

AllTours.Remarks: THIS IS A VOLVO TOUR WITH FOOD.
AllTours.Notes: Monday tour will be operated only in the month of May & June Thursday & Saturday tour will be operated through out the year.
The entrance tickets at Museums, Metro Rail ticket & Show at Akshardham temple is extra. No Service on Mondays as show in Akshardham Temple will not be screened & Museums are closed

AllTours.FullTourName: Delhi - Chandigarh – Manali – Chamunda - Dharamshala- Vaishno Devi – Amritsar

Monday tour will be operated only in the month of May. Friday Tour will be operated during the months of April, May, June , September & October.
